text: Simu Liu (; born 19 April 1989) is a Canadian actor and stuntman. He is best known for playing Shang-Chi in the 2021 Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) movie Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese television actors Category:Chinese voice actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Stunt performers Category:Writers from Toronto Category:Chinese writers Category:People from Harbin
title: Simu Liu
